products.title: Bella Blackout Teal Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout teal blue 89mm vertical blind in blue. Made to measure from 13.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. A fabulous blue/ green shaded fabric. A classic shade that will stand the test of time within your home.

products.title: Bella Blackout Turquoise Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout turquoise blue 89mm vertical blind in blue. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This bold bella blackout turquoise blue vertical blind brings cool-toned beautiful blue to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!Our best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous blue vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Tiffany (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bella tiffany (blackout) blackout vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
